content: For release on delivery  1:00 p.m. EDT  October 18, 2013      Toward Building a More Effective Resolution Regime: Progress and Challenges         Remarks by     Daniel K. Tarullo     Member     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at the      Federal Reserve Board and Federal Reserve Bank of Richmond Conference, “Planning  for the Orderly Resolution of a Global Systemically Important Bank”     Washington, D.C.    October 18, 2013
